  1. Work

Civic Hacking Agency

A father and son hacking for good.

During the COVID-19 pandemic, my son Elias and I began coding together as part of what we call the Civic Hacking Agency. Pojects include a congressional directory using Congress.gov API, a survey marker finder using National Geodetic Survey data, and ScanGov. More at USA.govfresh.com.
